Uses of Interface
org.xflatdb.xflat.transaction.Transaction

  • Packages that use Transaction 
    Package Description
    org.xflatdb.xflat.db
    This package contains the core classes for XFlat.
    org.xflatdb.xflat.engine
    This package contains the implementations of Engine that are provided by XFlat out of the box.
    org.xflatdb.xflat.transaction
    This package contains all the classes related to the public transaction API, as well as the main TransactionManager implementations.

    • Uses of Transaction in org.xflatdb.xflat.db

      Methods in org.xflatdb.xflat.db that return Transaction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected Transaction EngineBase.ensureWriteReady()
      Called before every write to ensure we are ready to write.
      Methods in org.xflatdb.xflat.db with parameters of type Transaction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EngineBase.RowData EngineBase.Row.chooseMostRecentCommitted(Transaction currentTransaction, long transactionId)
      Chooses the most recent committed RowData that was committed before the given transaction.
      void EngineBase.commit(Transaction tx, TransactionOptions options)
      Called when a transaction is committed to write the committed data to disk.

    • Uses of Transaction in org.xflatdb.xflat.engine

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Overrides ensureWriteReady to additionally check if the engine has fully finished spinning up

    • Uses of Transaction in org.xflatdb.xflat.transaction

      Methods in org.xflatdb.xflat.transaction that return Transaction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Transaction TransactionManager.getTransaction()
      Gets the current transaction representing the ambient transaction scope, or null if the current scope is transactionless.
      Transaction TransactionEventObject.getTransaction()
      Gets the transaction in which the event occurred.
      Transaction ThreadContextTransactionManager.getTransaction() 
      Transaction ThreadContextTransactionManager.TransactionBase.getTransaction()
